content: Set terminal title: echo -e "\e]2;Implementation: Clippy fixes for expect() and missing docs\007"
MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Fix 10 regex constants in format_discovery/constants.rs - replace .expect() with proper error handling
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Fix all .expect() calls in format_discovery tests (8+ instances) - replace with .unwrap() in tests
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Add missing crate-level documentation comment to main.rs
Add missing documentation for BrpMcpService struct in main.rs
Add missing documentation for BrpMcpService.roots field in main.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and any compile warnings (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
Fix any clippy issues (no dead code, no _ prefixes)
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes - focus on identifying duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
